Item.method_code:
' server-side Method (VB): xPLM Set Assigned Creator ' ' This xPLM Server Event is used to set the property "Assigned Creator" to World ' ' called OnBeforeAdd ' based on Reset Innovator Admin References ' 'MethodTemplateName=VBMain;
Dim thisErr As Aras.IOM.Item Dim innovator As Aras.IOM.Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim new_id As String Dim new_identity As String = "World"
Function Main() As Item
Dim owned_by_id As String = Me.getProperty("owned_by_id","")
If owned_by_id Is Nothing Or owned_by_id = "" Then new_id = CStr(getidentity(new_identity)) Me.setProperty("owned_by_id",new_id) End If
Return Me
End Function
Function getidentity(ByVal name As String) As String
Dim tmpin As XmlDocument = _ CCO.XML.CreateXMLDocument("<Item type='Identity'><name>" + _ name + "</name></Item>") Dim tmpout As XmlDocument = CCO.XML.CreateXMLDocument() CCO.GetItem.GetItem(tmpin, tmpout) If CCO.XML.HasFault(tmpout, False) Then Return "NULL" End If Dim item2 As XmlElement = CCO.XML.GetResponseItem(tmpout) If IsNothing(item2) Then Return "NULL" Else Return item2.GetAttribute("id") End If
End Function
Item.name: xplm_setCreators
